snippet.title: DeMagnete VR - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
In DeMagnete, you assume the role of D, a dweller in an enigmatic cavern, and holder of two magnetic-powered gloves. Guided by Q, a mysterious robot-companion, you follow chamber after chamber solving puzzles using magnetism-based mechanics. As you go deeper, you journey through caverns, cryptic rooms and through a lava-river, trying to reach your goal.

Coming to all major VR Platforms
PSVR, Oculus Rift, SteamVR, Valve Index

Follow us on https://www.Twitter.com/BitCakeStudio !
Join our https://www.Discord.gg/BitCake !
